text: Elektromos Futball Club was a Hungarian football club from the town of Budapest. ==History== Elektromos FC debuted in the 1936–37 season of the Hungarian League and finished ninth. == Name Changes == *1921–1936: Budapest Székesfőváros Elektromos Műveinek Testedző Egyesülete *1936–1944: Elektromos FC *1944–1945: Elektromos MTE *1945–1951: Elektromos Munkás Sportegyesület *1948: merger with Kelenföldi Elektromos *1950: merger with Phöbus FC *1951–1957: Vasas Elektromos SK *1957–1999: Elektromos SE ==References== ==External links== * Profil Category:Football clubs in Hungary Category:1921 establishments in Hungary Category:Association football clubs established in 1921 Category:1999 disestablishments in Hungary Category:Association football clubs disestablished in 1999
title: Elektromos FC
